dict.string: Enter the info you set in BazQux's 'Mobile login' settings
Enter username (or Email) and password associated to your FeedHQ account
Enter username and password associated to your InoReader account
Enter username and password defined in Settings/General section of theoldreader.com

Enter the server's address (API URL) and your credentials. For FreshRSS servers, the API URL typically ends with "/api/greader.php", and the API password is defined in the "Profile" section of the website.
